body.p: The Wine development release 1.3.6 is now available.

What's new in this release:
Support for GStreamer filters.
Mapping of standard cursors to native desktop cursors.
Improved support for installers with services.
Many MSXML improvements.
Decoder for TGA-format images.
Translation updates.
Various bug fixes.

p.p: The source is available now. Binary packages are in the process of being built, and will appear soon at their respective download locations.
